title: Ep. 761 Justice Isn’t Blind Any More
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the troubling actions of FBI lawyer Lisa Page, who has failed to comply with a congressional subpoena. I also address the incredible “secret sauce” business recipe for an investment firm and a new report on school security from the Secret Service. 
 
News Picks:
Does Scandinavian “socialism” work?
 
Debunking liberal lies about Supreme Court nominee Kavanaugh. 
 
What is Rod Rosenstein doing getting involved in the Supreme Court nomination?
 
This is a must-read Secret Service report on school security. 
 
Here’s the “secret sauce” for business success. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
